home.intro: I am studying applied science the IIS Blaise Pascal high school in Giaveno, Iâ€™m passionate in computer science and involved in climate activism. I speak Italian, English (Cambridge C2) and German (Goethe B1). I have chosen to study computer science at Maastricht University next year and in the future I hope to explore ways machine learning can be used to predict extreme weather events.
